page.title: 04My Day by C.Chatwin aged 10
page.content: {7:30 I wake up and stay in bed for 5 {minutes. I go downstairs and have my {breakfast(weetabix),then I go and feed {my guinea pigs.Afterwards I clean my {teeth and wash my hands and face.Then {I pack my bag and wait till Nick {comes. 8:25 We go and call for Andy and walk to school.At school we meet our friends. {8:45 The bell goes and we go in for {registration and dinner list.After {that we go to assembly and then have {lessons.In I.S. we do about the {Domesday Project. 10:15 We go to French.In French we are doing about the weather. {10:45 We go out to break if isn't {raining.In the playground we play tig {or runouts. 11:00 We go in for maths.In maths everyone wants a wooden stool.
